data.text: @kdrum Drum circular logic. If it were this clear we would have found an animal host. Dork

@kdrum “New studies” which are not public and haven’t been peer reviewed prove nothing. We also need to know who wrote them and who is funding them. Sadly “science “ has become badly politicized in recent years
@kdrum It doesn't confirm. It makes a strong argument for it.
@hahnalytics @kdrum I never thought it was intentionally leaked, but I thought it was bioengineered, not maliciously but to better understand how to fight it if it ever mutated in the wild.

@kdrum I find it almost a parody what people are concluding from a study, takeing place months after the the first case, focusing on the distribution of environmental Covid. How can this show where it started?  It was done by Chinese researchers, probably with govt approval.

@kdrum Nope.  Not remotely.  There are multiple critiques coming out now (as you’d expect after a few days from preprint release), but the fundamental problem is as per below:  y https://t.co/shE0CJP4f5
